definitions: a person who adapts a musical composition for performance

examples.text: he was among the finest arrangers and orchestrators of ballet scores

shortDefinitions: person who adapts composition for performance

definitions: a person who arranges flowers in a display

examples.text: a group of enthusiastic flower arrangers

definitions: a person who organizes or makes plans for an event or deal

examples.text: the arrangers of the bond sale started to test market demand

shortDefinitions: person who organizes or plans event or deal
